document.full_text: the washington capitals silenced a stunned new york crowd by rallying from three goals down to beat the rangers in double overtime and seize control of their nhl playoffs series on wednesday.
document.title: caps and pens win in double overtime as wings advance
lines_and_colors: the washington capitals silenced a stunned new york crowd by rallying from three goals down to beat the rangers in double overtime and seize control of their nhl playoffs series on wednesday.
